Exaggerate: The claim exaggerates the percentage of times Heitkamp has voted against Trump by excluding votes on presidential nominations.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks enough support as it only considers policy votes and excludes nomination votes.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that opposition to Trump's agenda can only be measured through policy votes, ignoring the significance of nomination votes.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation for the discrepancy in the voting percentages, as the claim excludes votes on presidential nominations.
